nodes.text: Maulkiller's lightsabers were two lightsabers owned by the Dark Side Adept Maulkiller. They were used by Maulkiller to kill and cause destruction.

The only way to get these lightsabers was if you got the GameStop exclusive bonus preorder avatar for players of the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 versions of the video game Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II. The lightsabers would give the player less Force energy while using the Force. It was called "Maulkiller Silver Saber Crystals" in the information for the preorder bonus.
